question_text: Which of the following best describes Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n)?
answer_options: Operates only at 2.4 GHz and supports MIMO
Operates only at 5 GHz and supports MIMO
Supports both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz, with MIMO
correct_answer: Supports both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz, with MIMO
explanation: Wi-Fi 4 introduced MIMO and supported dual-band operation, making it more versatile than earlier versions.
